council_profile.political_control: No overall control. Green largest group (~22 seats of 61), Labour close second (~21), Lib Dem 7, Conservative 5, Morecambe Bay Independents 3, others.

ch_breach_spend.note: 8 current suppliers have Companies House compliance issues. Historical payments were made before breaches started.

split_payments.note: Split payment detection has a high false-positive rate. Batch processing and legitimate recurring payments can trigger this pattern.

year_end_pattern.note: ENVIRONMENT AND PLACE spent 3.4x their monthly average in March. Borderline spike warrants monitoring.

preston_city_council.note: Shared services arrangement with Preston CC

cross_council_context.price_gap_notes: Lowest HHI supplier concentration (118) — most competitive supplier market of all 8 councils.
